scripts.build: echo "Skipping web build, building server only..." && cd server && npm run build
scripts.build:all: echo "Building web app..." && cd apps/web && npm run build
scripts.build:firebase: cd apps/web && npm run build && echo "Web build completed"
scripts.deploy: cd apps/web && npm run build && cd ../.. && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:all: npm run build:firebase && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:functions: cd server && npm run build:firebase && cd .. && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.test: npm run --prefix ./apps/web test && npm run --prefix ./server test
